response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds immense value for us and has the potential to significantly impact your business. We believe in creating win-win situations and aim to provide solutions that exceed expectations. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive offer for you to acquire this product at a special price of $950,000. This opportunity not only aligns with your requirements but also ensures a substantial return on investment. We trust that this proposal will be beneficial for both parties and look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 950000}
